services.title: Construction & Installation
services.description: If you're looking for basic construction or installation, I have experience in both private homes and businesses. Check out my recent work!

services.title: Repair & Remodeling
services.description: Have you gone as far as your knowledge will take you on a project? For anything your home might need, I have you covered. Call for a free consultation!

services.title: Maintenance & Home Services
services.description: Don't risk further damage to your home by letting maintenance fall by the wayside. Let us save you time take care of your honey-do list!

all.title: Turn Your "Honey Do" List into a "Honey Done" List!

services.title: Ceiling Stuctures
services.description: Hang ceiling fans, change ceiling light fixtures - especially pantry, laundry room, and closets

services.title: Curtains & Shutters
services.description: Hang blinds & curtains, install Plantation Shutters, take down or hang pictures or other decorations, install wall mount TVâ€™s

services.title: Assembly
services.description: Assemble furniture (including picking up boxed items at the store); shelving installation and shelf assembly

services.title: Power Washing
services.description: Power washing house, deck, sidewalk, porch, patio, driveway, and fences; stain/re-stain decks and fences; seal/reseal driveways; driveway edge pavers installed

services.title: Outdoors
services.description: Deck and fence maintenance and repair; Pergola and Gazebo installation, maintenance, upgrades, and repair

services.title: Plubming
services.description: Replace and repair toilets, sinks, faucets; repair/replace garbage disposals.

services.title: Electronics
services.description: Replace outlets and light switches, install dimmers, repair/replace outdoor lights and install new outdoor lights plus security lights and cameras

services.title: Safety Detectors
services.description: Replace batteries in smoke and carbon monoxide detectors; replace defective smoke and carbon monoxide detectors; install new smoke and carbon monoxide detector
